alert.note: Alert for Orange; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 12:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, Passaic, Union, Bergen, Essex, south central Orange and Rockland Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers and embedded strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Milford to Lincoln Park to near Millburn to near Union. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Rises on streams. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Paterson, Elizabeth, Passaic, Wayne, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Orange, Paramus, West Milford, Ridgewood, Summit, Lyndhurst and Millburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
